00000000.name: Player
00000000.text: Hello. I'm Player. Who are you?

00000002.name: Adventurer
00000002.text: Have you ever heard of the syldera?

responses.name: Player
responses.text: I might have heard of them before.

00000010.name: Adventurer
00000010.text: Really? Well, I myself and one of them.

00000020.name: Adventurer
00000020.text: Well, in short, Ahr created us to guide humans, but we were corruped by Keepers.

00000030.name: Adventurer
00000030.text: Don't feel bad, our numbers have dwindled significantly since the spark of creation.

00000031.name: Syldera
00000031.text: Ahr created us to guide the Ark, but we were corrupted by the Keepers.
